name: Sunny:Sunflower
description:
“Dear, Sunflower. We chose you and your sister to become new members of our family. We’re so happy we can finally have two beautiful children of our own to love and care for. I set up a fun game for you to find me. I hope you can discover me!" - Irma

_________________________

To move: Arrow keys

Interact: X key

Pause menu: Esc key

_________________________

part two coming soon..

WARNING! THIS GAME CONTAINS DISTURBING CONTENT, IF YOUR EASILY DISTURBED DO NOT PLAY! NOT FOR CHILDREN.
